discourse_list.title: Links to help understand Optimism (maybe useful before considering changes to it)

content.content: What is a Rollup; how do they work; what’s an Optimistic one?    finematics.com    Rollups – The Ultimate Ethereum Scaling Solution – Finematics         docs.ethhub.io   Optimistic Rollups - EthHub Optimistic Rollups (ORs) are one type of layer 2 constructions that do not run on Ethereum's base layer but on top of it.         Optimism Docs   How Optimism Works Introduction Hello! By the time you've finished reading this page you should have a foundational understanding of how Optimism makes Ethereum transactions cheaper and faster, the a      What makes Optimism special?    Medium – 7 Feb 22    Introducing EVM Equivalence Or, Ethereum All the Way Down: How We Learned to Stop Re-implementing and Love the Ethereum Stack  Reading time: 11 min read         podcast.banklesshq.com    Bankless: EVM Equivalence | David Reads 📄 READ THE ARTICLE:   ------ 📣 THE GRAPH | Graph Day in San Francisco | June 2-5    ------ 🚀 SUBSCRIBE TO NEWSLETTER:              🎙️ SUBSCRIBE TO PODCAST:            ...         The Optimistic Dev Blog – 19 May 22    Introducing Optimism Bedrock Bedrock is the cheapest, fastest, and most advanced rollup architecture. Ever. Optimism has always tried to stay on the cutting edge of rollup architecture. Last year, we introduced the concept of EVM Equivalence, the rollup design pattern of using...         Castbox    2 - Ether's Phoenix with Optimism's Karl Floersch Karl Floersch is the co-founder of Optimism, the Ethereum rollup scaling solution, as well as one of the primary advocates in the space for public go...       … What else should go in this list?     NicoEsp:  I would add the Optimism Vision      optimism.io    The Optimistic Vision Together, we can create future of coordinated, collaborative cyberspace.          norswap:  Lecture I gave on how the rollup will work post-Bedrock & fault proofs: Optimism - Norswap - Lecryptofellowship.com            krzkaczor:  Good resource to learn about current risks associated with Optimism: L2BEAT      l2beat.com    Optimism – L2BEAT Optimism project overview on L2BEAT. In depth layer 2 protocol analysis. Ethereum scaling analytics and research.
Thank you for putting this all together. This is the wei
